mapper.select: SELECT C.ID AS 'id',C.CNAME AS 'cname' ,R.CVALUE AS 'cvalue',R.RID AS 'rowindex' ,C.`DESC` AS 'desc' FROM t_row_ww_info R , t_column_ww_info C WHERE R.ID = #{id} AND C.ID = R.ID AND R.CID = C.CID AND R.RID NOT IN( SELECT RID FROM t_row_ptyw_info WHERE ID = #{id} AND (CVALUE = 'FALSE' OR CVALUE = 'false') ) ORDER BY R.RID ASC
